name: Color Claim
description:
I frequently use Tobias's color palette in my personal projects.


This color palette was created for Sketch, Creative Cloud, but not for Figma.


So I defined the colors and created them for figma so that everyone can use them as a library after downloading.


  • Added 120 colors
  • Added background & foreground color style
  • A component used for color preview


That's all. I hope it was useful.


If you like it, you can follow me and my 14 year old brother.


Source : https://vanschneider.com/colors
